content.detailedDescription:
All commercial a/c's were traveling crosswind to final over our lakeland location until this event.  a/c's when event began started to a far ne point to enter patern for seatac, running far south of us.  

3 disc formation, center disc slightly higher elevation in formation.

three bright white discs appeared at about 2000 ft. slowly crossing valey heading west. just before or at federal way disc on left peeled off at a faster rate to the south...Center disc rotated(inverted) over right disc
and headed nw follwed by the 3rd and last disc. size deminished as they were moving away. appeared that the center asset and the 3rd asset sped up
as they went south to about 100 plus mph...No sound was noticed.

..........................................................................

my wife first noticed it and called up to me ...I took a couple pictures but i cannot say they are anything to brag about.  the camera is new to me and i funbled for the first shot.  i was getting ready for bed, my wife was enjoying the puffy clouded sunset.

the objects were bright white, judging where they were, clearly not normal a/c lights and had a shallow diamon / disc appearance

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

will have to send off pictures later
content.summary: 3 discs, 5 mi. range, 1/4 mi. appart, s of super mall, heading west 50 mph

I was looking up at the night sky which i do as much as possible to see if i could see anything out of place. at 10:08 i saw 2 dimly white objects moving south it look like one behind the other or one high and one low moving slow.

content.detailedDescription:
We was on vacation in manila (philippines) and we stayed in a hotel (cherry blossoms hotel) in malate,metro manila.In the evening of june 27. i looked out of the hotel window in the 4th floor and saw an object hovering in the sky beside of a condominium building.The object was spinning around while completely still hovering maybe around 100 meter high.It moved after several minutes slowly to the right,then stopped again and moved slowly to the left and flies behind the building.It crossed the whole building and came out on the left side of the building.Then it was flying staight and slow out of our sight.In the pictures and the video it seems not to spin,but when we looked at it while taking pictures its clear to see that it spins around.We are sure,that no plane,balloon or helicopter was at that time in that area.
we were totally exited during and after the event and knew,that it was not normal.We all think that its really a ufo.I hope that our video and the pics can help you to find out more.You can contact us anytime for further information.We have still more pictures (26 in all)
thank you,
m.M.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The object spins around,moving slowly from left to right and back.

content.detailedDescription: At a progressive dinner party close to 16 ne. i spotted craft with unuseual motion moving from north to south at under 1000' feet and under 150 mph. the direction wae streight and level but motion and shape of craft were all wrong. at that hight it was catching setting sunlight. the craft apeared to be a 15 foot dia. cylinder and 100 feet long. ( 10 to 1) ratio no mater what actual size. the craft rotated slowly about its long axis showing differant features ofits surface in the sunlight. at the sametime the craft more rapidly rotated end to end parallel to the earth. it made no audible noise (old hearing is faulty). iwas the only on at the party looking ithe exact direction and by the time i reacted and called to the others only one caught a fleeting glance and said she only saw flash of reflected sunlight. my first reaction was that it was unlike anything i had ever seen. i staid quiet afterwerds because this was sensitive business function for my wife.
content.summary: Sitting on a deck,3 blocks from lake sammamish looking east and up at a 30' angle with a hill blocking sun setting in the west, i spoted ufo  flying south over the lake.

content.detailedDescription: Orange yellow light  star like  object seen around clouds that were discharging, i was sitting at my neighbors  fire pit talking there with them,  there were some storms almost above me  kinda back behind me a lil  was looking at them and the stars  and i saw a orange yellow light  star like  object near the clouds edge that was glowing from lightning  with in the object was just there   me looking up seeing the odd thing and it going was less then a min,  more a few seconds  , i took a double  take on the object cause it alomost kinda look like a shooting star or a plane  landing light  it was bright  as soon as i locked on it  it shot off  at say a 45'0 angle till it was no longer visible in to  space . that was it   kinda odd lately  this is the 3rd object in like 2 months that was truely odd it was simmiler to the other report i posted infact i say it could have been the same object  i reported near clouds a few weeks ago .
content.summary: Orange yellow light  star like  object

content.detailedDescription: The objects moved around in the sky forming several different shapes including a triangle, then l shape, then all bunching together. these all turned different colors as well such as orange, yellow, and white. could tell these were not stars because of the size. at one point it compared to the moon. saw at nighttime. there was three different main spots in the sky that the objects appeared. did not make a sound.
content.summary: 3-4 orange-yellow-whiteish objects

content.detailedDescription:
Some years ago, i do not remember exactly when, i had this very strong and intense "day dream" about a ufo hovering over an airport gate.....I did not think any more of it....

then last year while just casually surfing he web for info on ufos, i do that just for fun sometimes, i bumped into the o'hare airport ufo story. it perked my attention for 2 reasons, first, was the strong day-dream i had before....Second, was the fact that the o'hare ufo was over united's gate "17". for some reason the number 17 has had huge significance in my life....All of the events that i will mention next here occurred "before" i thought that the number 17 had any significance in my life, so it's not like i planned any of these events that could have been planned by me with the number 17 in mind, some obviously could not have been planned by me. (i first realized the number 17 was significant around 2001 when i first saw in my baby book, that i was born at 1:17 pm, on october, 17th.) so thats the first event of the number 17, i as born at exactly 1:17 pm on october, 17th, 1957. also, my mom was born in the town of ligonier, pa outside of pittsburgh, a town that was founded in the year 1817. i got engaged on march, 17, 1984. we got our marriage license in the allegheny county city hall building in pittsburgh, a building that opened in the year 1917. my ba college diploma from the university of pittsburgh is dated december, 17th, 1980. i was in a bad car crash this year, and the ambulance arrived at the scene of the crash at exactly 9:17 pm. (i saw the printed record of the ambulance report from waning to get blood sugar info from the report etc).

so, there you have it....I day dreamed about something almost exactly like the o'hare ufo incident, and the number 17 has huge meaning in my life, and the chicago ufo hovered over united's gate 17. just wanted to share these strange events and coincidences with you.

roy scott
content.summary: I had a strong day dream with great significance to the chicago airport 2006 event, details below.

content.detailedDescription:
My name is [name removed/cms/tg]. i am a 38 year old male and have the need to share with you this sighting, for it has troubled my mind for the last few years.  through much prayer,i decided to have a record of this experience and the significance of this event be formally recorded. on the night of this event, i felt compelled to go outside and observe the sky, for reasons only god knows the answer to. on or around the the 28th of july, 2006 at 7:00pm....I was witness to a craft which was traversing the sky, at around or above 18,000 feet. i observed it from on our balcony facing due south, in the direction of its flight path. in southern california, if you know where the i-5 and 14 freeways intersect, this is the general area it was heading from my vantage point.
 the location was over the santa clarita valley,(canyon country is where i lived specifically) and was headed in a southwest direction toward the san fernando valley...(both are in the los angeles county area respectively). this craft was a boomerang or chevron configuration. it closely resembled a letter v.
it emitted no sound and had red lights running laterally down the trailing edges of the body. these light did not blink, but rather faded one after another before cycling again down the craft's wing structure. i would with 100% confidence estimate this v shaped vehicle to be in excess of 1,000 feet...Or nearly a 1/4 mile in width wing tip to wing tip! the speed of this vehicle defied aerodynamic law for a vehicle that would have been under conventional propulsion means as we know them to be, with regard to aircraft such as fixed wing prop, or jets. it moved so damned slow. how can it be there?! the time of length of my sighting was roughly 5-7 minutes, before disappearing beyond mountains that obscured further observation.
 i can estimate the altitude of flight because it was higher than the cirrus clouds. enough light was present from the still fading sun to observe cloud cover and the black coloration of the craft, and was coming back into view from behind (or above) clouds at times that were in the sky. the clouds were sparse and not very many were present.
 i think you will love to know, that 2 others were able to observe this ufo with me. my mother and father. when i initially saw this thing, i ran into the house and alerted my parents to the presence of this craft. they followed me to the balcony and stood in utter shock as we observed it together. my mother noticed something that gave her a point of reference to the scale of this thing. she pointed out that a passenger aircraft was flying literally under it! we all watched it pass under the triangle because the jet was visible with the triangle behind or above it in the background. this was possibly a 747 jet aircraft (we saw the jet had 4 wing mounted engines). it was massive. "holy cow!...That jet could land on it mom!", i exclaimed. the size of the jet was like that of a tic-tac in the sky, the v shaped craft was bigger than her fist when she held her hand in front of her and tried to cover it.
 my father later made the comment, "i was on a big ship in the navy. that thing was bigger than an aircraft carrier, and it was in the damned sky"! seeing this thing has changed us. we now know that there are things in this world that are not of this world. i seriously question that this vehicle was of our own design. whether it be that of extra-terrestrials would be in itself a miracle! our family is mormon. we have not been negatively affected in our belief in christ and our heavenly father by this event. it actually strengthens our faith if anything, that god in his infinite wisdom, saw fit to create other worlds and give life to them among the stars.
content.summary: massive v - shaped craft, black, silent, red lights cycling on to off along edges.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were sitting in a field over by her house, when we heard a strange, high-pitch, whirring noise. we didn't know where it came from and started looking around. i looked up in the sky and almost immediately, a blue beam of light appeared to emanate from a point in the sky. the beam was at a 45 degree angle to the horizon, curved upward near the top, and slightly widened toward the lower end. the bottom end of the beam initially reached the ground so it couldn't have been far away.  my first thoughts immediately were that it was a ufo. i pointed it out to my friend, and once she saw it, she wouldn't look at it again because she was so scared. we panicked and ran to her house. about 4 minutes later, i looked at the light again, and it seemed to be more vertical, and the end of the beam was gradually moving higher and higher into the sky. i called my other friend to go outside, look, and see if she could see it, but she couldn't. even though i could still see it, while she was looking as well. she just laughed at me, but i was so scared. it made me think it was pulling something up into the sky. we went into the garage, and sat there for a few minutes. about 5 minutes later, when i went outside, the light was gone. later that night, i couldn't sleep and i was up until 5 in the morning because i was scared of what i had seen.
content.summary: Me and my friend heard a high-pitched whirring sound, followed by the appearance of a blue beam of light emaneting from a point in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a meteor shower with my sister and mom. we were looking out the window to the backyard because it was very cold, and all of a sudden we see this weird triangular ufo fly over us. it had 5 dull red "lights" underneath, was somewhat low and moving quickly. it was completely silent! all 3 of us saw it and were very excited that we were actually seeing this. we really wished we had a camera. it disappeared behind the roofs of other houses in the neighborhood. we tried to get a better view in our front yard, but it was gone. definitely not a meteor or airplane!
content.summary: [tg] dark triangular figure, with 5 dull

content.detailedDescription:
We were getting hit by the biggest storm this summer, i stepped outside to get some pictures. it wasn't until later, after looking at the photos, that i realized that i had captured something strange.

i have 2 images, that were taken 4 seconds apart. both from the same place.

the first shows clouds looking threatening. time stamp: 22:46:26

the second shows numerous "orbs", i only mention this because the first shot has none visible. it also clearly show an object moving fast from left to right. the object is bright at the tip and tapers off to a dark tail in the rear. time stamp: 22:46:30

these images are still in my camera. 

i have included 3 images in this report, the first and second shot, as well as a close up (100%) scale, no resizing. no editing other than cropping on one so that the two are better comparable.

not sure what it was, but if it had been a meteor, it was very close, as it is this side of the clouds. we live in the city, so a meteor would have had to burn out before it hit the ground, or it would have hit a house and made the news.
content.summary: Meteor-like

content.detailedDescription: I'm not sure of the exact date of this event. i may have it written down somewhere, but i don't feel like digging.I know it happened in the late nineties close to the millenium. my friend and i were in my backyard fishing in north stonington ct on the border of ledyard a couple miles from foxwoods casino. we looked up suddenly and saw this green glowing light in the sky shaped kind of like a comet. it almost looked like a meteorite falling out of the sky with a "tail" behind it, as if it were burning. it fell down out of the sky and went down in the woods behind our visible horizon. it looked to be about two miles away, judging from it's relation to the casino/reservation. from that distance the object appeared quite large in the sky. i've seen meteorites fall before, but i've never seen anything that large from that distance. it was definitely an unidentifiable object. my friend and i were both very excited at this strange sight. a few minutes later, my phone rang, and a friend of mine who lived on the other end of town said he and two of our other friends had seen it from there as well. when i answered the phone, the first thing he said was, "you're not going to believe this, we all just saw a ufo."blank" and i saw it from my house, then "blank" called and said he saw it from his house. i'm not sure about this, but he said he saw a bunch of helicopters flying in that direction towards where it went down." we all waited to hear something about it on the news, but there was nothing. five of us saw this event/object from three different locations around town.On two or three other occasions, i have also seen lights in the sky that moved the same as most descriptions of ufos i have heard. they hover in one place for awhile, then they seem to either disappear and reappear somewhere else, or move in impossible directions very quickly.
content.shape: Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Teardrop,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: My friend and i witnessed a green object (flash/light) shaped like a comet with a tail crashing behind the horizon in the woods.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been a police officer for ten years, and i served active duty in the united states army in a reconnaissance unit.  one of my duties in the military was to observe and be able to identify aircraft from many countries, primarily those from the united states and the former soviet union.  i am also a huge fan of helicopter aviation.
	i was working patrol on the night of 7/16/11 on the 2230 ��� 0630 shift.  i was in uniform and in a marked patrol car.  while patrolling on a main street in town, i was driving southeast away from the lake and toward the downtown area.  at approximately 2352 hrs., i noticed a single, white light in the sky moving northwest.  the light appeared to be at an altitude of approximately 1,000-2,000 feet over the downtown area.  i first thought the object was a helicopter.  just up the street from me was a large hospital which averages probably 4-5 medical helicopter transports a week.  i am very familiar with the medical helicopters which frequent my area, and after a few seconds i realized that what i was seeing was not a helicopter.  
	as the light came toward me, i realized that it had no navigational or hazard lights (the green and red lights which flash on an aircraft).  it had a single, white light.  it was very bright at first.  as it got closer to being directly overhead, i noticed that the light appeared to be cigar shaped.  but as it got even closer to being overhead, the light seemed to dim.  by the time it was overhead (approximately one minute since i first saw it), it was as dim as most of the stars in the sky.  in fact, if it hadn't been moving, i probably would have thought that it was a star.
	i actually stopped my patrol car in the middle of the street and had to stick my head out of my driver's side window to look up at the object because it was directly overhead.  the object continued to move northwest, but it was dim and appeared to be much higher than when i first saw it.  in fact, it appeared then that it was 10,000 feet or higher.  
	then i was amazed when the object stopped dead in it's tracks and began to zig and zag, back and forth!  it went in all directions.  i would estimate that if it was 10,000 high it was probably moving maybe 200 feet in each direction around the point where it had stopped.
	it became difficult for me to watch the object with my head sticking out the car window and looking over the roof of the car to my west, so i made a u-turn and parked along the curb.  i could now see the object by looking out of my window toward the west.  shortly after i parked, i phoned my wife to tell her what i was seeing.  my cell phone indicated that i called my wife at 2353 hrs. on 7/16/11.
	just after i started talking to my wife, the object stopped zigging and zagging and it began to move toward the east.  just then, another police unit with two officers pulled up and asked what i was doing.  i ended the phone call with my wife and i informed the officers about the object that i was watching.  we then exited our respective vehicles while we watched the object.  both officers saw what i was seeing.  one of them believed it to be an aircraft.  the other officer said she wasn't sure what it was.
	as we watched the object continue east, we noticed an aircraft far out in front of it, also flying east.  the object and the aircraft appeared to be around the same altitude, but the object had become so dim that it was hard to determine how high it was.  in fact, several times the object's light appeared to fade out completely and then quickly fade back in.  however, at no time did the light of the object appear to flash or blink.
	all three of us watched the object move east and, once again, it stopped in mid flight and began to zig and zag around the point it stopped.  the one officer continued to believe that the object was an aircraft, and the other officer said she didn't know what it was.  then the other officers had to move their vehicle because they had stopped in the travel lane and they were blocking traffic.  i got back into my vehicle and drove east and parked in a parking lot one block east of my original location where i continued to watch the object.  it continued east and its light faded in and out a few more times.  i lost track of where the aircraft, which i had seen in front of it, had flown.  then i received a call for service from my dispatcher and i had to leave the area.  the total time i watched the object was approximately 15 minutes.
	later that night i looked to the sky in the direction i last saw the object but i didn't see it again.  through the course of the night i did see two meteorites, one to the north of town over the lake and one to the south.  however, i am familiar with what meteorites look like and the object i watched was not a meteorite.
	later in my shift i tried to call the local international airport to see if they had any aircraft or any other contacts on radar at that time.  but i only got an automated system and was never able to get through to anyone there.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object with single, white light appeared over city and lake erie and moved in ways i've never seen an aircraft move.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside seen flashing lights circling a tower with flashing red light lasted approx 45 min got in car with camera and started in direction of tower got lost and was on a dark isolated road and had some type of dark shodow silotte following above car got headache hairs stood up on arms and head and started to tear up for no real reason got very nervous but at the same time not afraid finally got to the tower and seen lights and turned on camera but would not respond my fiance stayed at home and still observed lights there was atleast two and maybe three.I have felt very odd every since with no aparrent reason.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Objects hovering up down and all around a comunications tower

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a moblie home park aproximate location 114th and ida at aprox 940 pm i was sitting on my porch watching fire works--wind sw to ne. off to to the east a bright red object caught my eye i figured some type of fire works. but it didnt go out. i watchet the object contine west against the wind.As it passed over my location higher than all fire works it apeared to be a round object with a light pulsitaning in side of like a light inside a jar. it contined for aproximatel 24 of of a mile and disappeared. over the nex 34 of an hour or an hour 3 mre of thes objects appeared on the same course and same higth thes objects admitte no sound of any kind and in my judgement continue west and all disapeared at the same place. there altitude is unknow the apeared to be a sphere of about 5 inches in diamater.
  for 30 years i was a police officer and a trained observer. at night altutide id difficutl to determine. i know what i saw sa not avation lights. i have no idea waht they were but have learnde on 2 july and 4 july very similar objects were filmed over the omah area. i just know thes object are nothing i have ever seen before
content.summary: Ared roud object flue over not air craft

content.detailedDescription: On the night of july 22, 2011 at around 9:00 pm my 5 1/2 year old son and i were alone on litchfield beach. we had just watched some small fireworks from people about 100 yards up the beach and remained lying on our blanket to look at the stars. it was a clear night. we were facing the ocean and stayed there gazing and talking about the stars and the beach. a few people passed by walking but eventually we were alone in our area. after about 30 minutes (now close to 9:00 pm) i decided it was time to return to the beach house. my son sat up first and when he turned around he exclaimed immediately about what he saw in the sky behind and to the left of us. i sat up, turned and gasped because it was a large orange glowing orb (far larger than any aircraft)which appeared to be moving toward us but was actually moving away (north) from us. it was over land not ocean and we watched it move slowly and smoothly across the sky for close to 2 minutes then disappear into isolated cloud cover or maybe the haze of myrtle beach lighted sky. my son was a little worried but i remained calm and explained what "ufo" and "unidentified" actually meant. about another minute later i turned around and it was there again but directly behind us. we both saw it. it was clearly visible and seemingly a brightly glowing gaseous or firery orange orb with red outer tinge (with outstretched arms if you encircled it with hands-about the size of a grapefruit or large apple). my little boy said "it looks like fire and gas". it was unlike anything i'd ever seen in the sky before. this time i was uneasy because it was quite ominous and eerie so when my little boy said "i think we should get out of here...Mom,lets go" i stood up grabbed our blanket without shaking it off and we left, still watching it as we walked up and over the boardwalk. on the golf cart ride back to the beach house i said that no one was going to believe us. we returned to the beach house and told all of the family about it. my son described it the same as i would have as "orange and round and on top what looked like a red cap". it was a little hard falling asleep just thinking about it.
content.summary: Large , red-orange glowing orb moved slowly across sky, disappeared then reappeared closer

content.detailedDescription: Was waiting for a friend after school in 1966 at a basketball court at marlow heights rec. center nobody around when i look up at a apartment building when i saw what i beleve to be a flock of geese i then started to shoot a the basket hoop the ball when past me went after it then since i did not here any noise from the geese i look towards them an notice it was not geese but a group of triangular shape objects they came right above me making no noise so close i threw my ball at them then they slowly move away an went west my friend show up then i pointed at them so he could see them so i would not look crazy then right after they vanish it was a overcast day we notice in south a red fire ball in the sky the triangular objects came from the north when i first saw them did not tell anybody about them until the late 90's i was in the 10 grade i just want to no if anybody saw what me and my friend saw because of the fireball happen at the same time i thing somebody reported it .It made no noise five of them flying in a triangle an moved in order together when it turn i am not making this up i no what i saw if you check out about the fireball i think it was in 1966 in the fall at southern maryland area
content.summary: Black triangle 5 of them flying in a triangle

content.detailedDescription:
On 2-10-2010 at approx. 10:45pm out my window of my venice beach, ca apartment i could see a hovering craft with an illumines bottom side come in from the left slowly parking itself about few hundred yards south of the santa monica pier and about at the end of the pier out in the water. about a 1/4 mile away. we have routine noisy police helicopters but after about 3 minutes of silence with it flickering these colorful soft lights i decided i needed to capture what clearly was a disc shaped ufo on my nikon d90 slr 12.3mp camera. it did change shape and look roundish and phase out a few times in this encounter. the lights were not like police warning lights. almost like the skin of the craft was shimmering these soft lights in different places. i had a better zoom lens but i wanted to get it captured as fast as possible and the sigma 50mm lens was on it so i went with that. took a few shots and looked and camera was on daytime settings. just mostly black so i adjusted but went too far opening f-stop. readjusted again constantly looking up to see if it was gone. it wasn't to my amazement. this is a large tourist area and it was just parked there. i took a few shots and liked what i saw and snapped a few more then had to go for video. 8 pictures came out well. the nikon d90 has 24p so i recorded about 30 seconds of very interesting footage that needs to be analyzed in a computer or avid bay. not too much ufo footage is shot in this high-res format. it shows the craft flickering its lights and phases in and out of the air. i needed my glasses to see the back led which you use on the nikon for video only but the reading glasses weren't near so i thought i lost the space craft so i stopped the recording (kicking myself) but after i'd saved the file which i did in a nervous i know i have something manner. i looked up to start to capture more but didn't have time. was in awe as it float up like a fast balloon over the santa monica mountains and up to a extremely high altitude til it was gone.

 the same craft can be seen in a later video on youtube. search "ufo sighting in santa monica". youtube user bluntrolledtight. 
 also search "santa monica silver surfer ufo on nbc la" to see the same ufo parked in the same position many months later. 

doubt our military is dumb enough to do that. looks like either they want contact or they like the giant ferris wheel at the end of the pier that emits a similar light pattern. i kept this not telling a soul. no need to. i knew what was it was and was blessed to have a very close look at an extraterrestrial space vehicle. i have recently decided to share the experience with others who care to know more or are looking for an answer. the rest of the public, i'm not interested in.
content.summary: 1st known pictures/video of santa monica ufo wave

content.detailedDescription: As we were fishing at santa ana river lakes in anaheim, ca near the 91 and 55 freeway interchange we looked to the night sky when a low flying triangle shaped object with lights on each point caught both mine and my wifes eye. it was silent and seemed to just glide in the night sky. it was headed in the diraction of the ocean and came from the mountain area. it was close to the size of a passenger jet. it was not very bright though. i would say it was like a light bulb on a dimmer switch about half way turned down yet still very visible. you could see that it was very clearley a triangle and that it had some substance to it. as it flew closer to us the lights looked like rectangle shaped, then when it was right above us we could see that they were squaire, then as it flew past is and we keep looking at it the front light went out of sight being that the craft was level to the sky only leaving the two back lights of the  rectangle shapes visible, then they to went out of sight.
content.summary: Dimely light triangle shaped craft with three lights on it flew over head

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from work at around 2:30am on highway 71. i was traveling at about 65-70mph going north(towards del valle). two blue-ish lights appeared from under the slight cloud cover. the lights hovered for maybe a second or two and abruptly shot off in the distance and the lights went out. 
i live pretty close to the austin airport, but the planes they use don't normally perform such intense moves.
i thought it may have been a meteor or a shooting star perhaps but was quick to reject the ideas since the lights were under the cloud cover and shooting stars and meteors fall. these lights shot in a straight line.
the two lights may have been attached to one single object since they did not move apart/away from each other, they were constantly perpindicular with each other throughout my brief sighting. i suspect that the object/craft may have been a boomerang shape with a rather sharp angle in the middle, something like > i can not be exact on this idea since it was dark and the angle in which i had witnessed the event. there are a lot of variables but i haven't seen anything like it.
content.summary: Two lights hovering and then shot off

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight at 1130 pm i steppeod out on the deck to get some fresh air. as i was looking at the stars i noticed an orange to amber looking light heading towards me. this would be from north to south in direction. i first noticed it glowing through the trees, i kept watching it and thinking that it is a strange color of light on an airplane. i was waiting for the landing lights to turn off and and just leave the red and blue or green wing tip lights on. this never happened. i called for my wife to come out and look at it also. she came out and saw it. i ran back in to grab my phone to take some sort of picture. as soon as i turned the camera on and pointed it up the light veered left, started to gained altitude very quickly and also started to dim. as soon as it dimmed i thought i saw a streak of very faint light go towards the object from the south. it almost seemed like it was being shot at by something.  my wife did not see this because she ran back in our room to get her glasses on..
we are very familiar with the airplanes flying around here. sometimes the flight path for seatac airport is right over our home. also joint base lewis mcchord flight path goes overhead. so we know it was definitely not an airplane.
i would say when i first saw the object it was 4-5000 feet. by the time i lost it, it looked like it was from 100000 ft to even in orbit.
we also did not hear any noise coming from the object but a few minutes later we had a small airplane further away go by and we could hear it.
content.summary: I stepped out on the deck to get some fresh air and look at the stars. i saw an orange/amber light heading south.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at my desk and noticed suddenly loud vibrations/humming encompassing my house. i assumed it was a very low flying plane so i looked out my window. i saw in the forestry across my house several very bright laser-like green lights that flashed for a few seconds and disappeared. it was fluttery, green light particles that reminded me of a green laser. i could not believe what i saw and quickly rushed outside where the sound persisted; a very low frequency, humming, vibrations, that sounded like a kind of alien ufo. i did not see anything else after the light. the sound,  however, went on for nearly half an hour but varied in intensity and eventually faded away.
content.summary: Flashing green laser lights accompanied by intense vibrations/humming

content.detailedDescription: Out for a walk through suburban neighborhood with five friends. somone pointed to the sky at an orange glowing circle. it was brighter than any stars. there were air planes in the sky too for reference. it was much brighter and not blinking, but the same size of the planes. it seemed to hover oddly then fly off across the sky . we followed it past some tree lines and it either vanished or got too far away. many of the witnesses initially thought it was a crashing plane on fire. possibly metor but didn't seem too move fast enough and lingered in the sky.
content.summary: Amazing bright orange light in the sky. hovered before flying off.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 7:50 p.M., my son and i were in our backyard when he happened to look up into the sky and noticed a very bright and shiny long white object flying in the blue sky. it was a good sized object (depending on distance) as related to an airplane that was also in the sky flying near the object. we used my phone to capture still images as well a video (attached)that shows the plane in the frame (the plane shows black against the blue sky). the object was traveling at a much slower speed than the plane. when zooming in on the still image (attached), the shape looks saucer like and has an orange glow in the center. there were no blinking lights.
content.summary: Extremely bright & shiny orangish-white cigar/saucer shaped object flying through blue sky

content.detailedDescription:
Long line of bright orange lights moving in succession over the southern horizon, just above the treeline. appeared to be approximately 30 degrees above the horizon. they appeared to be a bit smaller than a pea.

objects were circular and did not flash. all objects followed the same path across the sky. my brother-in-law called me across the street to look at them, he indicated that he had seen about 15 of them already.His wife, and our two neighbors also witnessed the objects. in the twenty minutes that i watched, another dozen or so followed. they appeared to be below the cloud cover. 

we live in the flight paths of both logan airport in boston, and tf green airport in providence, as well as multiple smaller private airports. the lights did not appear to be airplanes. they did not have green and red wing lights, nor the amber tail and head lights. they did not flash at all. multiple planes flew over head during the event. these planes produced the only sound. the orange objects observed did not create any sound. the orange objects also did not fly in any of the observed flight paths. planes bound for logan tend to travel over head from the west and to east, and then turn north. these objects were moving from the west towards the east.

the objects were observed through binoculars. they appeared to be from a single object, and with the binoculars, no flashing was apparent.

the were only visible as they passed from the west behind tree cover, and then sight was lost as they neared the easterly horizon and were obscured by trees.
content.summary: Orange lights flying in succession

content.detailedDescription:
07/23/2011	

   the events i am about to describe are absolutely true and were witnessed multiple times by myself and 1-2 other individuals at the same time.  these events were witnessed during the years of 2001-2002 and again in 2008-2009.  under no circumstances were the individuals involved under the influence of any substance.  the following sightings were observed by multiple individuals without the influence of suggestion, or ���wishful thinking���.  each of these incidents was exactly alike in nature.   
at the time of my first sighting i was in my mid to late teens.  it was sometime in the summer months at around 10:00 p.M. to 12:00 midnight, as me and a friend of mine were awaiting his car ride home.  we had been waiting outside in the drive way under what was a perfectly clear night sky, for about forty-five minutes to an hour when something caught my eye.  
    i have always been a bit of a ���star gazer���, that is, i enjoy the beauty and awe of a well star-lit night.  so naturally, my eyes are often glancing to the stars, but this particular night i noticed what appeared to be a star in motion.  the object, from my point of view, appeared no different than the stars in the night sky: it twinkled exactly like a star and was the same size of a star from a ground-level perspective.
using my best judgments, the object seemed to be at a very high altitude- almost right outside of the earth���s atmosphere.  it was moving on a steady path at what would have been a high rate of speed in regards to how high it seemed to be traveling- much like how a plane seems to be moving slow when viewed from ground, but its actual speed is about 400 mph.  
i watched this strange object make its way across the sky with such curiosity and confusion in my mind regarding its identity.   during this point in my observation, i didn���t direct my friend���s attention to it because it was happening relatively fast and i was trying to process what exactly was going on.  it traveled this path for about 20 seconds from the time i noticed it until it did something that made my heart sink into my stomach.  
    the object suddenly came to a complete and abrupt stop in mid-air, made a wide-angle turn at what looked like 4x its original speed, shot across the sky at an even higher rate of speed (without the characteristic ���tail��� associated with shooting stars) into the direction from which it came, and literally vanished into the night sky.
in response to this, i naturally started screaming in disbelief at what i had just seen.  my friend laughed and attempted to offer suggestions as to what it could have been (a plane, satellite, comet, etc.) but i knew better.  in an attempt to explain what i had seen to my friend, i pointed to the sky and used my finger to describe the path the object had taken.  within minutes i noticed the same object a second time, taking a similar path as the first sighting.  this time both me and my friend were observing the object repeat this similar course of travel, redirection and departure.  needless to say, we were both baffled and i had gained another reason to watch the skies. 
    several years later on a similar summer night, i was standing outside in my father���s backyard beside a small bonfire talking with my brother and father.  looking toward the stars, i noticed the same object making its course across the sky.  this time i made no hesitation to direct my company���s attention to the object.  once again, the strange oddity followed the exact same course flight, redirection and departure.  all of us who were present saw the same events at the same time.
i have no knowledge of any natural phenomenon that could occur as i have described.  there is no technology that i am aware of that could perform the way this object did.  i have no desire to create such stories for attention or for personal thrills.  i am in no way assuming that this/these object(s) are of any particular origin, be it human or ���extra-terrestrial���- i simply do not have enough evidence or knowledge of the subjects to support either theory.  the only facts that i can absolutely be certain of are: 1) the events occurred exactly as described above; and 2) the object does exist.
content.summary: Star-like object makes unusual manuevers in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Objects were observed flying n.E. for approx.8 min. they maintained a separated distance in a triangle pattern and appeared to be gaining altitude. i got a pair of binoculars and the objects looked like pictures of the old sky hook balloons. i do not think these are in use any more. it was unusual that these maintained and equal distance from each other and were moving fast and climbing. i lost sight of them when they went behind a cloud.
i noticed the objects as they reflected the sun and i was in front of my kitchen window. i just noticed the bright specks moving in a steady but peculiar formation so i went out to look. i had no fear or sense of anything extraordinary but the objects were not aircraft of any type i know of.
content.summary: 3 objects flying n.E. triangular pattern looked like sky hook balloons

content.detailedDescription: While taking my children trick-or-treating in lapeer michigan, essentially downtown lapeer, we were going from house to house when overhead a large orb of light appeared.  it was completely silent.  it was hard to tell a size or distance of the object, but i would estimate at 20 feet in diameter and 100-200 feet in the air.  the orb just hung in the air while we and about 30 other people looked at it.  it began to move with out purpose going to the left and to the right, back and forth, all in very quick jerky movements.  it then shot off to the horizon faster than a blink of the eye.  we did not know what the object was, but it was 100% not any form of man made aircraft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Silent and very fast orb of light

content.detailedDescription: Well i was waiting for my wife at a target store in brooklyn park, mn.   when i noticed 3 lights coming from the east going west, they were red orange balls. at first i thought they mite be helicopters, but color did  not fit. as the came closer they were round and the moved slowly in the night sky. time was about 10 pm  they did not make any noise and stayed on a straight line and spaced pretty even, i could not tell how far apart the were maybe  a half a block or so. there was about 10 or 12 people watching it happen, i do not know any of them.  when i realized they where not planes i remove my camera from the bag and started taking pictures.. using a canon camera with a 300 mm lens.
content.summary: 3 red/orange fire ball in sky
